resources.string: Send this code from your main device \nfrom telegram to the registration number of the detector
Enter the phone number in the international format.\nUse the wrong phone number to which telegrams are registered!
Enter the code for the telegrams.\nHe will come in sms or another detector delta (or telegram) to the registration number

If you like the program, rate it 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=d.rock.deltat 
If you have any questions or suggestions, write 
a.rock.developer@gmail.com
